attributes.action: ccommission research into whether Magic Mushrooms cause any harm to people consuming them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Magic Mushrooms were made illegal in 2005 after which seems a knee jerk reaction to some tabloid journalism.

When they were legal I took them many times and had no problems nor did any of my friends.

As I am not a scientist I cannot 100% say they are safe but neither can they! They made them illegal WITHOUT any research or tests. All I am asking is if they are dangerous-prove it.

A lot of retailers selling this product went out of business because of which seems some negative press which I feel is unfair.

Please sign my petition, not to condone the taking of Magic Mushrooms but to protest against a decision of such costs without any real research or investigation.
